attributes.action: Mental health patients should be housed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Give housing to mental health patients who are not disabled and dont leave it to the Councils to leave them waiting for months and months then say - "NO".  

Close down the Councils and use their money for important issues.

rejection.details:
Please use a full name.
Please make your title a call for action, not a statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
False or incomplete name or address information
